sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useState, createContext } from "react"; import { useNavigate, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Cartcontext } from "./Cardcontext"; import Stripe from "./Stripe"; import "./Cart.css"; const Cart = () => { const Navigator = useNavigate(); const { shoppingcart, totalprice, qty, dispatch } = useContext(Cartcontext); const shippingprice=totalprice>0?50:0; return (
{/*

shopping cart

*/}
{shoppingcart.length > 0 ? ( shoppingcart.map((cart) => (
{cart.name}
QUANTITY

{cart.qty}

SUBTOTAL

{`$ ${cart.eachtotalprice}`}

)) ) : (

oops! your cart is empty

)}
Products {`$ ${totalprice}`}
Shipping {shippingprice}
Tax 13%
Total {`$ ${totalprice+totalprice*0.13+shippingprice}`}
); }; export default Cart;
